transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha hello. Haan ji sir good evening sir.
Customer: Nitish sir.
Executive: Haan sir Nitish baat kar raha hu sir bataiye. Good evening sir.
Customer: Aap kaise hai?
Executive: Ya sir.
Customer: Nitish sir aap kaise hai?
Executive: Haan haan bataiye sir.
Customer: Kaise hai aap? Haan haan nahi kaise hai aap? Theek hai? Badhiya hai sir aap kaise hai?
Customer: Haan badhiya hai bhaiya kushal mangal. Bhaiya hamara kaam nahi karate aap bhaiya aap se thoda naraj bhi hai hum.
Executive: Sir to increase to ho hi raha hai sir sara cheez aapka karwa raha hu sir domain aapka approval ke liye mail bhi gaya hua hai sir aapke pass.
Customer: Bhaiya inquiry vagaira nahi aa raha hai domain se kya sir. Sab kuch increase hoga sir aap iska sab kuch increase hoga aap call kar rahe hai sir aapka number mera hai sir aapke pass mera aap direct call kijiye na sir mujhe.
Customer: Haan sir theek hai theek hai baba theek hai aage se direct call karega.
Executive: Haan aapka kaam chal raha hai sir aap concern open kar rahe hai matlab ki sirf 9696 pe call kar dete hai. Ye close kar du sir?
Customer: Close to kara diya hai na humne.
Executive: Nahi close abhi nahi hua hum karte hai na sir close aap satisfied kar dijiyega theek hai mail jayega to.
Customer: Wo wo madam to bata rahi thi ki close ho gaya.
Executive: Koi jaise product vagaira jo haan bataiye.
Customer: Koi ek madam humse phone karke koi ek OTP liya hai. Jo hoga. Haan abhi call gaya tha aapke pass. Haan bataiye.
Customer: Jo hoga koi code dene se koi dikkat hoga?
Executive: Nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hoga sir koi dikkat nahi. Aap aapka sab kuch dekh liye na sir product vagaira dekh liye na sara cheez aap ok kar diye na. Ok hai na?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan ok ok product add karna hai koi product add karna hai koi edit.
Customer: Nitish ji humko call karna bola humne unko call.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe direct call kar lijiye sir theek hai?
Customer: Koi baat nahi call le ja baba kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir thank you.
Customer: Okay okay.
Customer: Kya okay okay hum kuch bol rahe hai aap khali okay okay bolte ja rahe hai. Haan bataiye.
Customer: Mai kya bol raha hu tum. Theek hai haan hello.
Executive: Haan haan bataiye.
Customer: Call inquiry nahi badh raha bhaiya abhi kya ho raha hai. Sir call dekh raha hu sir sari cheeze dekh raha hu.
Executive: Calls inquiry sari cheeze dekh raha hu sir aisi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Isi liye to maine maximumizer dilwaya sir ki calls inquiry sari cheeze increase hogi.
Customer: Theek hai. Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about low inquiry rate.

- Customer says executive is not doing his work.

- Customer mentions a lady took an OTP from him.



Resolution:

- Executive assured the customer that inquiries will increase.

- Executive asked the customer to call him directly.

- Executive said he will close the concern.

- Executive confirmed no issue in sharing OTP.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiry, otp, call, domain, product
